item.description: Our very own Phyllis will be performing at the Teapot Gallery. Phyllis is a solo artist. She performs acoustic versions of a variety of genres including folk rock, blues, country and pop. She will sing hits from the like of Bonnie Raitt, Melissa Etheridge, Sheryl Crow, etc. Her original work is posted on her page at www.myspace.com/plataille. The Teapot Gallery is a quaint and charming restaraunt that supports the work of artists, via poetry, open mic nights, musical performances, classes and so forth. Light fare and drinks can be purchased during the performance. Lets get out there and support an up and coming artist!!!
item.name: Phyllis Lataille at the Teapot Gallery
